contents:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appellant’s failure to enter timely objections at trial has resulted in a waiver of the issues presented in this appeal. Commonwealth v. Agie, 449 Pa. 187, 296 A.2d 741 (1972). See Commonwealth v. Clair, -Pa. -, 326 A.2d 272 (1974). The order of the Superior Court is, therefore, affirmed.
ROBERTS, J., dissents.
